verses.name: Exodus 24:7
verses.text: And he took the book of the covenant, and read in the audience of the people: and they said, All that the Lord hath said will we do, and be obedient.

verses.name: Exodus 24:8
verses.text: And Moses took the blood, and sprinkled it on the people, and said, Behold the blood of the covenant, which the Lord hath made with you concerning all these words.

verses.name: Exodus 24:9
verses.text: Then went up Moses, and Aaron, Nadab, and Abihu, and seventy of the elders of Israel:
